body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Christian Rodriguez and the customer's name is Joan Perry.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Christian Rodriguez and I am with Clear Path Accounting Firm.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Joan! How can I assist you today regarding your billing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit confused about the charges on my last invoice.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be concerning. Can I first ask for your account number to pull up your details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's two zero three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joan. And could you also provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's nine eight seven six five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information. Now, let me take a look at your billing statement to clarify things for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time, Joan. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out.
